Detailed Description

Class for sphere Physics Objects.

This is the math base for the mathematic simplistic representation of spherical physics based objects

Member Function Documentation

Implements PObject.

Scalar POSphere::detectCollision ( PObject *  object  )  [virtual]

pure virtual detect collision

This is the function that we will use to figure out the distance from another object and thus if we collided with it

Returns:
Scalar value that is >0 if there is no collision =0 if they are just touching and <0 if they have hit to intersection(hit with force)
Parameters:
brings in a pointer to a physics object to test for distance/collision

Implements PObject.

varList POSphere::getStats (  )  [virtual]

pure virtual get Statistics for the object

This is the function that we will use to get the object's data for the objects

Returns:
returns a list of stats. The first is the type ID.
Parameters:
none 

Implements PObject.
